subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Pacers’ Paul George put up a determined defense against the Knicks’ Carmelo Anthony in the playoffs. As a reward for his efforts, George was asked to defend LeBron James.
snippet: The Pacers’ Paul George put up a determined defense against the Knicks’ Carmelo Anthony in the playoffs. As a reward for his efforts, George was asked to defend LeBron James.
